pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.5: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.8: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.15: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti, na sakkoti padasā gantuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.4: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.5.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.10: vayhaṁ ratho sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.2: Agilānā vematikā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
